title: Forum Mystery
body: It appears there's just one random guy going around downvoting almost every single post that gets put up, seems strange and is also pretty annoying. Maybe I'm wrong but it's just weird the forums just seem to be rows of 0's.

replies.body: Eh it happens. Realistically if a post or comment doesn't have more than 2 votes either way it doesn't really mean much, and 5 is high for OCE. Especially when you get into debated topics the votes vary so much just by who's active at the time, and of course every now and again you'll get someone downvoting everything they see just because.
Lord Sesh how come you never play League of Legends, but you keep replying on League's boards? Sorry, I'm just curious.

Sesh is just a front ;)

my actual lol name is Itachi Uchiha
I do play league, roughly about 4 games a day.

Circumstance led to this being the account I post on, and now its a little hard to change seeming everyone knows me as Sesh :P
Isn't Itachi Uchiha that guy from Naruto?{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

Yep.
and Lord Sesshomaru is a similar character from Inuyasha.
Everyone has a voice to which threads are visible, so if you notice any good discussions, you can also give your “up” or “down” vote!

I down vote when i witness poor English, someone who's spammed boards with the same post several times, or when the post is about something stupid like

"ARURF Sucks because its 1 sided" - Not saying its untrue but...

but i would not say i'm a phantom down voter

Generally i just lurk so, i'm free of any possibility of guilt
Good to see boards drama live and well.
